review: I LOVE this item. I wish I would have ordered 2 more at the promotional price. We do not have smart TV's nor streaming devices in our bedrooms. This product is easy to install-plug into TV, plug into outlet. I can access both my Amazon and Netflix accounts. The remote control is small, but has easy functionality. I find this much easier to use than the playstation and have used it almost daily since I received it!!
author: Tiffini

review: Way better than my Chromecast. I just wish it was powered by my TVs USB instead of the AC adapter. Other than that I love it. The remote is so much more convenient than casting from my phone (which it can also do), AND I can finally watch Amazon Prime shows, a feature the Chromecast is sorely lacking. I still use the Chromecast to stream Pandora on my stereo, but for TV Fire Stick is where it's at.

review: Great product I loved it, i use it all the time............ so much better than my chrome casts and roku sticks.I am giving it 1 star because 3 times I have set pin protect purchases, 3 times this feature has turned itself off.3 times now I have had to ask amazon for a refund because it immediately starts streaming after the purchase.My guess is it is a glitch, some sort of bug, perhaps updates revert the setting to off.  Regardless I can't use this product nor should anyone.  Roku makes a great stick and I have never had a problem with it.Go with a roku it does everything the fire stick does, just not as well.
